resources.string: Can\'t change this setting while %s is on.
To use this function, download the following application:\n\n%s
Unable to add items. Maximum number of quick settings items(%d) reached.
No USIM card is inserted. Insert a USIM card and try again.
Your version is up to date.
To use %1$s, %2$s needs to be turned off.
This may reduce your battery life.
The Name field cannot be empty.
An incorrect username has been entered. Tap OK to try again.
An incorrect password has been entered. Tap OK to try again.
The username field cannot be empty.
The password field cannot be empty.
Unable to find application to perform action.
Select which apps you want to receive notifications from.
Receive notifications from this app, including notification messages, sounds, and vibration.
Allow or block notifications from individual apps.
Any settings you\'ve changed won\'t be applied.
%1$s and %2$s cannot be used at the same time. Disable %3$s to use %4$s.
Blue light filter turned on. It will be automatically turned off at scheduled end time.
Reduce eye strain by limiting the amount of blue light emitted by the screen.
Main text will look like this.
%1$s and %2$s cannot be enabled at same time.
This will clear cached data for all apps.
All of this application\'s data will be deleted permanently. This includes all files, settings, accounts, databases etc.
Unable to delete data for app.
If you force stop an app, it may cause errors.
To use your irises to unlock the device, you must set a pattern, PIN, or password.
You\'ll use the backup password to verify your identity when you can\'t use your biometrics.
To use your fingerprints or irises to unlock your device, select a secure screen lock type, such as Pattern, PIN, or Password.
To use fingerprints securely, you need to set a pattern, PIN, or password.
The fingerprint data has been corrupted. Add your fingerprints again.
There is not enough space in your device storage. Delete some items and try again.
The fingerprint sensor is not responding. Try again later.
An error has occurred with the fingerprint sensor. If this message appears repeatedly, restart your device.
An incorrect backup password has been entered.
Use a fingerprint or enter the current password.
Use a fingerprint or draw the current pattern.
Use a fingerprint or enter the current PIN.
Enter at least %1$d characters, including at least 1 letter and 1 number.
Enter the password again to confirm it.
Password used before. Enter new password.
Your password must contain at least %d characters.
Password must not contain repeating characters.
Password must contain at least one letter.
Password must contain at least one number.
Password must not contain letters or numbers in order.
Password must contain no more than %d characters.
Your password must contain at least %d characters, including at least one letter.
PIN must not contain repeating numbers.
PIN must not contain numbers in order.
PIN must contain no more than %d digits.
PIN must contain at least %d digits.
You need to connect at least %d dots. Try again.
Use WLANs and mobile networks to provide more accurate information about the location of your device.
Connecting to mobile networks may incur additional charges
No SD card is inserted. Insert an SD card and try again.
View which apps can read your notifications.
Sync is currently experiencing problems. It will be back shortly.
Set a pattern, PIN, or password to use together with fingerprint recognition to lock or unlock apps.
Save your changes or discard them?
